content: WASHINGTON (Reuters Breakingviews) - Neither Carl Icahn nor Donald Trump is looking good in a fight over biofuels regulations. The billionaire investor wanted rules changed to help CVR Energy  a refiner he controls. Icahn resigned on Friday as the president’s adviser on deregulation just ahead of a New Yorker story detailing these alleged conflicts of interest. The picture gets even murkier because the White House now seems to be saying there was no job for Icahn to quit.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Breakingviews-Icahn and Trump both look bad in biofuels fight

content: The Securities and Exchange Commission issued an unusual order this week to wrap up its investigation of CVR Energy  the fuel refiner Carl Icahn acquired in a hostile tender offer in 2012. The SEC concluded that CVR failed to give investors enough information about its fee agreement with the two investment banks it hired to help the company fend off Icahn’s takeover. CVR  according to the SEC  should have said in its SEC filings that the banks  Goldman Sachs and Deutsche Bank  would

content: Dec 28 Activist investor Carl Icahn trumped Japanese tire maker Bridgestone Corp's latest offer for Pep Boys-Manny Moe & Jack by $1.50 per share  as the bidding war for the U.S. auto parts retailer continues.

title: UPDATE 1-Carl Icahn trumps Bridgestone's offer for Pep Boys again

content: Dec 24 Japanese tire maker Bridgestone Corp  raised its offer to buy U.S. auto parts maker Pep Boys-Manny Moe & Jack to $947 million  still below a possible sweetened offer by activist investor Carl Icahn.

title: UPDATE 2-Bridgestone raises offer for Pep Boys to $947 mln

content: Carl Icahn offered to buy Pep Boys–Manny  Moe & Jack  in a deal valuing the U.S. auto parts retailer at about $837 million  trumping Japanese tire maker Bridgestone Corp's  offer of $810 million.

title: Icahn trumps Bridgestone with $837 million offer for Pep Boys

content: Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn said he is betting against high-yield bonds  as he sees a bubble among companies that have overborrowed recently  and expects the dollar to keep rallying into next year.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Icahn betting against high yield  sees dollar rising

content: NEW YORK Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn said that knowledge is power in the field of investing  and cited his short bet against the euro  while Bonnie Baha of DoubleLine Capital said U.S. economic conditions were worse than three years ago.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Highlights Day 3: Shorting the euro  weak conditions in U.S

content: U.S. miner Freeport-McMoRan Inc said on Wednesday it will add two new directors to its board under an agreement with billionaire Carl Icahn  bowing to pressure from the activist investor  who is the company's largest shareholder.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Freeport shares soar as Icahn execs gain seats on miner's board

content: Oct 7 U.S. miner Freeport-McMoRan Inc  said on Wednesday it will add two new directors to its board under an agreement with billionaire Carl Icahn  bowing to pressure from the activist investor  who is the company's largest shareholder.

content: In an uncharacteristic move  activist investor Carl Icahn's Icahn Enterprises LP  made a $100 million investment in Lyft Inc.  adding momentum to the ride-sharing company's rapid expansion but leaving its cash pile far behind rival Uber.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Carl Icahn invests $100 million in ride-sharing service Lyft

content: May 15 In an uncharacteristic move  activist investor Carl Icahn's Icahn Enterprises LP made a $100 million investment in Lyft Inc.  adding momentum to the ride-sharing company's rapid expansion but leaving its cash pile far behind rival Uber.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: REFILE-UPDATE 2-Carl Icahn invests $100 mln in ride-sharing service Lyft

content: May 15 Ride-sharing company Lyft Inc said it raised $150 million  led by a $100 million investment from activist investor Carl Icahn's Icahn Enterprises LP.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: Carl Icahn invests $100 mln in ride-sharing service Lyft

content: March 23 Activist investor Carl Icahn raised his stake in Chesapeake Energy Corp to almost 11 percent even as the company continues to cope with low oil and gas prices.

content: NEW YORK Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn's publicly traded investment fund posted its first annual loss since 2008 last year  undone by plummeting oil prices  the company said in a regulatory filing on Friday. | Video

title: Icahn's investment fund posts first loss since 2008 on oil plunge

content: NEW YORK  Feb 27 Billionaire activist investor Carl Icahn's publicly traded investment fund posted its first annual loss since 2008 last year  undone by plummeting oil prices  the company said in a regulatory filing on Friday.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: UPDATE 1-Icahn's investment fund posts first loss since 2008 on oil plunge

content: Feb 27 Billionaire Carl Icahn's publicly traded investment fund posted a loss in 2014  undone by plummeting oil prices  the company said in a regulatory filing on Friday.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: CORRECTED-Icahn posts loss as fund hit in 2014 by oil plunge

content: NEW YORK The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating whether CVR Energy Inc  might have made misleading disclosures to investors during its unsuccessful defense against billionaire Carl Icahn's 2012 hostile takeover  court documents show.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: SEC probes disclosures tied to Icahn takeover of CVR: U.S. filing

content: NEW YORK  Feb 11 The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating whether CVR Energy Inc  might have made misleading disclosures to investors during its unsuccessful defense against billionaire Carl Icahn's 2012 hostile takeover  court documents show.
name: Icahn Enterprises LP
title: SEC probes disclosures tied to Icahn takeover of CVR - US filing
